TopicTitle: [Death to the B-36 Peacemaker] Northrop Yb-49 [Quick Build] [Flying Wing]

Articles.Content:
The B-36 never deserved to live.

![hgTXfjE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hgTXfjE.jpg)

Press 1 to toggle the bomb bays.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kuIFvNA1UgU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

She takes a lot of experience to fly correctly. Flying wings do not fly like conventional aircraft.

Wait, mother russia? isn't the flying wing from america?

> 
> Wait, mother russia? isn't the flying wing from america?

The Russian answer is the Tu-160. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D

And I'm getting the Tu-160 into operational status soon.

And the flying wing was also developed in Germany. Jack Northrop and the Horton Brothers were simultaneously doing so.

That reminds me, I have to make a Ho-229.
